typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tracks
source(output(
		genre_id as string,
		tracks as string,
		parent as string,
		title as string,
		top_level as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> genres
tracks, genres join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == genre_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
